Your mother let out a loud laugh! "Ha ha, poor baby!! It is okay!! You just need time to relax. I had three brothers myself and I understand that you have needs! In truth, I have known for some time that you were attracted to giant women!"

How humiliating. . . here was your mother giving you quite a different talk than what you had expected. You thought she would talk to you about sex or something like that, but not quite like this. "I have decided to ground you. You need to learn self control and discipline!! What would happen if your little sister found out about this!!"

Your mind was reeling. It felt like you were in a bad dream.

"Stop pouting, son! You need to calm down. It will only be for a little while, okay!! Besides, I think. . . you might enjoy this sort of grounding!" your mother said cryptically as she handed you a strawberry.

You bit into the strawberry, it tasted very strange. Your head felt weird. . . like you had been spinning a lot. You were so. . . dizzy.

A loud booming noise awoke you, jarring you out of unconsciousness. You lifted your head up and saw your mother in the living room, she was about to take another step. . .

You gasped at how loud the stomp was!! You needed to get off of your back and stand up and figure out why everything was so incredibly loud. You stood up. . .but everything was still the same perspective. You were stunned!! You had been shrunken down!!

BOOOM!!

The noise was louder this time, as your giant mother began to approach you, a smile on her face. This wasn't looking too well. You screamed at her from down below.

"M. . . mom! W-why. . . why did you do this!!"

Your mother ignored you, either not hearing you, or not caring. Her large shapely body loomed overhead, as she stared down at you.

"Glad to see you finally woke up, little one!! You had a lot of things to do, now that you are only four inches tall!!"

You put your hands on your chest. Four. . . inches!! It couldn't be!!

"I hope you enjoyed that special strawberry!! Now, mommy has a lot of chores to do today, and you are going to help her, okay!" she said, her loud voice booming like a theater.

You just stared in fear. . .what kind of chores could she possibly want you to do at this size!!
